message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your interest, I am offering this exceptional product to you for $9,500. This price reflects the quality, benefits, and exclusivity of the item. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can make this valuable asset yours.
